name: Sea Love
description:
Game made for the #SEAJAM. Inspired by you-know-what type of  game, you have to connect 4 of the same king of trash (no need to be in a straight line) to clean the level. 3 kinda decent looking beautiful levels to clean.

The in-browser player resolution is somewhat broken. Try to click that barely visible full-screen button and it should be fine.

If there are performance issues in browser try the Windows build. It runs silky smooth on my low-end computer.
